advancements.rpg_classes.northling.title: Wild Rage on the skin
effect.berserker_rpg.blood_reckoning.des: Heals you and converts absorption hearts to health.
effect.berserker_rpg.blood_sacrifice.des: Converts your health to absorption hearts.
effect.berserker_rpg.carve.description: Reduces armor and increases incoming damage.
effect.berserker_rpg.outrage.description: Clears harmful status effects when applied.
effect.berserker_rpg.rage.description: You deal more damage, the less health you have. Can increase the effect on hit.
spell.berserker_rpg.blood_reckoning.desc: Dealing {damage} physical-damage around you and converting absorption to health. Also increases Rage duration.
spell.berserker_rpg.blood_reckoning.name: Blood Reckoning
spell.berserker_rpg.bloody_strike.descri: Deals {damage} physical-damage in trade of self damage, gives absorption for dealt damage.
spell.berserker_rpg.bloody_strike.name: Bloody Strike
spell.berserker_rpg.carve.description: On melee hit: {trigger_chance} chance to stack armor reduction by {bonus2} and increasing incoming damage by {bonus} for {effect_amplifier_cap} times.
spell.berserker_rpg.carve.name: Carve
spell.berserker_rpg.improved_bloody_stri: Increases power multiplier of Bloody Strike by {power_multiplier}
spell.berserker_rpg.nordic_storm.descrip: Spinning attack, that deals {damage_0} physical- and {damage_1} frost-damage on targets per second.
spell.berserker_rpg.nordic_storm.name: Nordic Storm
spell.berserker_rpg.outrage.description: Clears harmful effects, increases attack speed by {bonus}. Deal extra {damage} damage per hit and stack grievous wounds.
spell.berserker_rpg.outrage.name: Outrage
spell.berserker_rpg.rumbling_swing.descr: Jumps lightning fast, dealing {damage_0} physical- and {damage_1} lightning-damage
spell.berserker_rpg.rumbling_swing.name: Rumbling Swing
spell.berserker_rpg.soulaxe_drain.descri: Damages yourself, drains the souls of targets dealing {damage} soul-damage per second.
spell.berserker_rpg.soulaxe_drain.name: Sacrifice Drain
spell.berserker_rpg.wild_rage.descriptio: Enter a wild rage, increases attack speed by {bonus} and rage by {bonus2}, stacking up to {effect_amplifier_cap} times.
spell.berserker_rpg.wild_rage.name: Wild Rage
